hero.title: You're not going to make a TryOnYou.

zeroReturns.title: Zero Returns

perfectFit.description: AI-powered biometric analysis understands your unique body proportions and recommends garments tailored to you.

brands.title: Brands

askPeacock.title: Ask Peacock
askPeacock.subtitle: Your personal fashion assistant
askPeacock.greeting: Hello! I'm Peacock, your personal fashion assistant. ðŸ¦š I come from around the world to help you discover your perfect style. How can I help you today?

suggestedQuestions.date: What should I wear for a date?
suggestedQuestions.office: Help me with my office look
suggestedQuestions.refresh: How can I refresh my style?

responses.date: ðŸ’• A date! How exciting. I recommend something that makes you feel confident but comfortable. A midi dress in a warm tone or well-fitted jeans with a silk blouse would be perfect. The most important thing is that you feel like yourself. Can you tell me more about the location?
responses.colors: ðŸŽ¨ Colors are my specialty! To find your perfect palette, I need to know you better. Generally, if your skin has a warm undertone, earth tones, golds, and oranges will flatter you. If it's cool, try blues, grays, and silvers. Do you know your undertone?
responses.office: ðŸ‘” Office style can be very elegant without being boring. I suggest investing in timeless pieces: a good blazer, straight-cut pants, and quality shirts. Add personality with accessories. What's your workplace dress code?
responses.refresh: âœ¨ I love when someone wants to refresh their style! The first step is identifying what doesn't work for you and why. Then, we explore new silhouettes, colors, and textures. Is there something specific about your current style you'd like to change?
responses.greeting: ðŸ¦š Hello! It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm here to help you with everything related to your personal style. From choosing an outfit to redesigning your entire wardrobe. What would you like to explore today?
responses.default: ðŸ¦š Interesting question. In my experience traveling the world of fashion, I've learned that each person has a unique style waiting to be discovered. Tell me more about yourself and what you're looking for, and I'll help you find the best options for you.
